title: IRenderMaterial.SurfaceFinishFile
description: Gets or sets the path and file name of the pattern based on an image file for the surface finish of this appearance.
returns: Path to an image file for the surface finish
remarks:
This property is valid only if
IRenderMaterial::SurfaceFinishShaderType
is set to
swAppearanceSurfaceFinishShaderTypes_e
.swAppearanceSurfaceFinishShaderType_FromFile.
